alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 3:39PM CST until December 15 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR EASTERN HARVEY AND MARION COUNTIES... At 339 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ramona to near Newton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, Hillsboro, Marion, North Newton, Sedgwick, Peabody, Florence, Goessel, Walton, Burns, Lincolnville, Ramona, Lehigh, Durham, Tampa, Lost Springs, Newton Airport, Marion Lake and Pilsen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
